dashboard.label: SOC DNS Traffic for an IP

ime.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$","newTab":true}}]},"viz_imgLogStacking":{"type":"splunk.image","eventHandlers":[],"options":{"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d6ba5189366bc702e6d3"}},"viz_imgAboutThisPage":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"/static/app/log_analysis_made_easy/QuestionMark.png"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/log_analysis_made_easy/about_this_dashboard?form.id=$env:page$","newTab":true}}]},"viz_imgSearchForDashboard":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"/static/app/log_analysis_made_easy/MagnifyingGlass.png"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/log_analysis_made_easy/search_for_a_dashboard","newTab":true}}]},"viz_lblAboutThisPage":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## About This Page","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_lblSearchForDashboard":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## Search for Dashboard","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_0ZqtGWIg":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## DNS Logs","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_7C3VWtUP":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_gPPDQOCC"},"options":{"backgroundColor":"#4fa484","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByBackgroundColor)","headerBackgroundColor":"> backgroundColor | setColorChannel(tableHeaderBackgroundColorConfig)","rowColors":"> rowBackgroundColors | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)","headerColor":"> headerBackgroundColor | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)"}},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.setToken","options":{"tokens":[{"token":"answer","key":"row.answer.value"},{"token":"src","key":"row.src.value"}]}}]},"viz_d3e0hvQC":{"type":"splunk.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_eU6kjGZa"},"title":"Record Type","eventHandlers":[],"options":{"backgroundColor":"#53a051"},"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false},"viz_aBL8wC7q":{"type":"splunk.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_uptRToNE"},"title":"Reply Code","eventHandlers":[],"options":{"backgroundColor":"#62b3b2"}},"viz_mymwhmWY":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"SRC = $src$","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_7l8JQ7P0":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"answer = $answer$","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_VW50ssUb":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_6BFbMZsL"}},"viz_gSmQs1Vr":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"Did SRC Actually Go To Answer?","fontColor":"#ffffff"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_DNSTraffic":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats values(DNS.query) as query, values(DNS.reply_code) as reply_code, count from datamodel=Network_Resolution WHERE (DNS.src=$ip$ OR DNS.dest=$ip$) groupby DNS.src, DNS.dest, DNS.record_type, DNS.answer
| rename DNS.src as src, DNS.dest as dest, DNS.record_type as record_type, DNS.answer as answer","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"ChainSearch_DNSTraffic"},"ds_gPPDQOCC":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_DNSTraffic","query":"| search record_type="$rType$" AND reply_code="$rCode$"
| table dest, src, query, answer, reply_code, record_type"},"name":"chain_overview"},"ds_eU6kjGZa":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_DNSTraffic","query":"| stats count by record_type"},"name":"chain_record_type"},"ds_uptRToNE":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_DNSTraffic","query":"| stats count by reply_code"},"name":"Search_ReplyCode"},"ds_6BFbMZsL":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=corelight sourcetype=corelight_conn src_ip=$src$ dest_ip=$answer$ 
| table _time src_ip, dest_ip, conn_state"},"name":"ConnectionsFromDNSQuery"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}},"tokens":{"default":{"port":{"value":"*"},"rType":{"value":"*"},"rCode":{"value":"*"},"src":{"value":""Waiting Input""},"answer":{"value":""Waiting Input""}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-60m@m,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_IP":{"options":{"defaultValue":"","token":"ip"},"title":"IP Address","type":"input.text"},"input_e6aawkz9":{"options":{"items":">frame(label, value) | prepend(formattedStatics) | objects()","token":"rType","selectFirstSearchResult":true},"title":"Record Types","type":"input.dropdown","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_eU6kjGZa"},"context":{"formattedConfig":{"number":{"prefix":""}},"formattedStatics":">statics | formatByType(formattedConfig)","statics":[["All"],["*"]],"label":">primary | seriesByName("record_type") | renameSeries("label") | formatByType(formattedConfig)","value":">primary | seriesByName("record_type") | renameSeries("value") | formatByType(formattedConfig)"}},"input_qz57JpYE":{"options":{"items":">frame(label, value) | prepend(formattedStatics) | objects()","token":"rCode","selectFirstSearchResult":true},"title":"Reply Codes","type":"input.dropdown","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_uptRToNE"},"context":{"formattedConfig":{"number":{"prefix":""}},"formattedStatics":">statics | formatByType(formattedConfig)","statics":[["All"],["*"]],"label":">primary | seriesByName("reply_code") | renameSeries("label") | formatByType(formattedConfig)","value":">primary | seriesByName("reply_code") | renameSeries("value") | formatByType(formattedConfig)"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"backgroundColor":"#1434A4","showTitleAndDescription":false,"display":"auto-scale","backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"contain","x":0,"y":0,"src":"/static/app/log_analysis_made_easy/Two-tone-blue.png"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_lblDNSLog","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":97,"w":100,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblRemoteSAConnection","type":"block","position":{"x":50,"y":148,"w":230,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblSoftwareConnection","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":195,"w":210,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblFileHashMatch","type":"block","position":{"x":80,"y":248,"w":180,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblAccountLogin","type":"block","position":{"x":90,"y":296,"w":160,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblLogStack","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":346,"w":130,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblNetworkConnections","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":45,"w":220,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_imgDNS_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":90,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgSA_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":140,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_gpDWAuhB","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":190,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgFileHash","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":240,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgAccountLogin","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":290,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgLogStacking","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":340,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgNetwork_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":40,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgAboutThisPage","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_imgSearchForDashboard","type":"block","position":{"x":1170,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_lblAboutThisPage","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":0,"w":170,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblSearchForDashboard","type":"block","position":{"x":970,"y":0,"w":190,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_0ZqtGWIg","type":"block","position":{"x":530,"y":0,"w":170,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_d3e0hvQ DNS Traffic for an IP"}
